definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

sentences.english: Susan has 'luck' with ferns. No one can grow them like her.
sentences.chinese: 蘇珊在蕨草方面很幸運，沒有人能像她那樣種活他們。

sentences.english: Examples of epiphytes are ferns growing in the axils .
sentences.chinese: 附生植物的例子是長在樹枝腋上的蕨。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the content of heavy metals in Nephrolepis cordifolia increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 同時腎蕨對各種重金屬離子吸收總量也顯著提高。

sentences.english: Asplenium nidus, Conservatory, Hong Kong Park, Central.
sentences.chinese: 雀巢蕨，香港公園溫室，中環。

sentences.english: The photosynthetic physiology and correlative physiological indexes of Phyllitis japonica responsed to the different degrees of drought treatment significantly.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱脅迫對對開蕨光合及生理指標產生顯著影響。

sentences.english: The research aimed to compare the effects of different breaking wall methods on the sporoderm-broken rate of Ceratopteris thalictroides spores.
sentences.chinese: 比較不同破壁方法對水蕨孢子破壁率的影響。

sentences.english: It was among ferns I learned about eternity.
sentences.chinese: 我是在蕨叢中明白了永恆。

sentences.english: The function of bamboos differs from that of ferns.
sentences.chinese: 竹子的作用不同於山蕨。

sentences.english: A fern is seen on the bank of river Mura near the village of Izakovci, in east Slovenia.
sentences.chinese: 斯洛文尼亞東部，穆拉河岸的蕨草。

sentences.english: Examples of epiphytes are ferns growing in the axils.
sentences.chinese: 附生植物的例子是長在樹枝腋上的蕨。

sentences.english: There are lots of tree ferns and dead branches around.
sentences.chinese: 四周有許多樹蕨和枯樹枝。

sentences.english: The bracken was turning to the dusky gold of a fine autumn.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲蕨在晴朗的秋天正變爲暗金色。

sentences.english: Aim To isolate and purify high-purity potentilla anserina galactoside from Potentilla anserina L.
sentences.chinese: 目的從蕨麻中分離純化高純度蕨麻苷。

sentences.english: First, they erect four wooden pillars painted with fern leaf veins.
sentences.chinese: 首先，在平坦的場地上樹起四根繪有蕨葉紋的木牌柱。

sentences.english: Pteridophytes(Pteridium aquilinum) were a group of common edible wild plants in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 蕨作爲古代常見的野菜，其食用的歷史長達三千多年。

sentences.english: The development process and spore sterile culture of Pteris wallichiana Agardh.
sentences.chinese: 研究了西南鳳尾蕨的發育過程和孢子的無菌培養方法。

definition: celery wormwood (Artemisia carvifolia)/to give off/to weed
bound form used only in 苣蕒菜|苣荬菜[qu3 mai3 cai4]/Taiwan pr. [ju4]
